short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: The most advanced Speed Dial for your bookmarks! Speed-up your productivity with fast access to your favorite websites and tools.
short.cs: SpeedDial (vizuální záložky) s podporou skupin. Synchronizace mezi zařízeními zadarmo. Žádné reklamy!
short.de: Die fortschrittlichsten Speeddials der Welt für Ihre Bookmarks! Dies verbessert Ihre Produktivität!
short.el: SpeedDial (a.k.a. visual bookmarks) με ομάδες για έμπειρους χρήστες. Δωρεάν cloud συγχρονισμός μεταξύ συσκευών.
short.es,es_419: Organiza tus webs en diapositivas y grupos, con sincronización online entre dispositivos, gratis y sin anuncios.
short.fr: Le Speed Dial le plus avancé au monde pour vos dials!
short.it: Il più avanzato sistema di seelezione rapida del mondo per i tuoi segnalibri! Migliorerà la tua produttività!
short.nl: Het meest geavanceerde Speed Dial ter wereld voor je bladwijzers! Het zal je productiviteit ten goede komen!
short.pl: SpeedDial (znany także jako visual bookmarks) z grupami dla zaawansowanych użytkowników.
short.ru: Наиболее продвинутый SpeedDial в мире для Ваших закладок! Он значительно улучшит Вашу продуктивность!
short.sk: Najdokonalejší Speed Dial na svete pre Vaše záložky! Zaručene Vám zlepší produktivitu!
short.uk: SpeedDial з групами для досвідчених користувачів. Безкоштовна хмарна синхронізація між пристроями. Без реклами!
short.zh_CN: 供喜好自定义的用户使用的快速拨号（又称可视化书签）。且可跨设备免费云同步。没有广告！
short.zh_TW: 供喜好自訂的使用者使用的快速撥號（又稱視覺化書籤）。且可在裝置間免費雲端同步。沒有廣告！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e:
✅ Upgrade your "New Tab" page with a speed-dial to access your favorite pages anywhere / anytime in an organized fashion using groups (folders).
🔒 Privacy-friendly - no tracking, no ads, no data collection!

⭐ TOP FEATURES:
🔸 Cloud synchronization - synchronize your data between devices and browsers - for free!
🔸 Cloud speed-dials - access your links in any browser, even in your phone!
🔸 Search engines - easy access to your favorite search providers!
🔸 Timer - stopwatch / countdown / alarm
🔸 Top-sites - quick access to your most visited pages
🔸 Recently closed tabs list
🔸 Text notes - for your todo list
🔸 Tags support
🔸 Import from other popular extensions
🔸 Share your speed dials groups with your friends
🔸 Active development!

🔥 Need more features? Upgrade to PRO to get:
🔸 Live dials - a full live interact-able pages
🔸 Multi-page dials - multiple links in a list
🔸 Weather forecast - for any location for 5 days
🔸 Multi-search - multiple (custom) search engines integration
🔸 Splitting dial into multiple smaller
🔸 Row/column colors
🔸 Automatic Productivity mode
🔸 full list of PRO features:
https://github.com/fastaddons/GroupSpeedDial/wiki/PRO-version-features


❤ Support independent developer and official friend of Addons!
👤 Juraj Mäsiar, building extensions since 2016:
https://blog.mozilla.org/addons/2020/06/15/Friend-Of-Add-ons-Juraj-Masiar/

🔒 Privacy Policy:
https://github.com/fastaddons/GroupSpeedDial/blob/master/PRIVACY_POLICY.md

🕑 Recently added features:
🔸 The list of changes in last versions is available here:
https://addons.mozilla.org/addon/groupspeeddial/versions/

💌 Credits:
🔸 icons by Font Awesome: https://fontawesome.com/license
long.cs,de,el,es,es_419,fr,it,nl,pl,ru,sk,uk,:
✅ Upgrade your "New Tab" page and access your favorite pages anywhere / anytime in an organized fashion - using groups (folders).

⭐ TOP FEATURES:
🔸 cloud synchronization - synchronize your data between devices and browsers - for free!
🔸 Cloud dials - access your pages in any browser, even in your phone!
🔸 Search Dials - easy access to your favorite search engines!
🔸 Recently closed tabs list
🔸 Top-sites - quick access to your most visited pages
🔸 Timer - stopwatch / countdown / alarm
🔸 Text notes - for your todo list
🔸 import from other popular extensions
🔸 active development by this cool guy: https://blog.mozilla.org/addons/2020/06/15/friend-of-add-ons-juraj-masiar/

🔥 Need more features? Upgrade to PRO to get:
🔸 Live dials - a full live interact-able pages
🔸 Multi-page dials - multiple links in a list
🔸 Multi-search - multiple (custom) search engines integration
🔸 splitting dial into multiple smaller
🔸 row/column colors
🔸 automatic Productivity mode
🔸 and more PRO features is in development!
🔸 see PRO examples: https://github.com/fastaddons/GroupSpeedDial/wiki/PRO-version-features


❤ Support independent developer and official friend of Addons!
Juraj Mäsiar - https://blog.mozilla.org/addons/2020/06/15/Friend-Of-Add-ons-Juraj-Masiar/
